::Hot Rod::
   
  Hot Rod: Alright, honey. I'm going to come see you for a little bit because I may have to leave on an important mission soon.
   
  Hot Rod turns to Kup.
   
  Hot Rod: Keep an eye on Remus.
   
  Hot Rod walks off towards Elita's room.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Elita:

Elita awoke and said half sleppy "Daddy? I'm in my room, you was in 
afight outside and mom didnt liked that I go... She left me in my 
room"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder is monitering the comm channels and comes to realize that 
Salveo is trying to direct all communication and actions through the 
city systems. Elder opens a line to Salveo.
> 
> Elder: This is Lord Elder of The Watchers. I have been trying to 
raise Lord Perseus but i'm sure you can get in touch with him. Status 
report: Rodimus Prime and Remus both injured. Rodimus' repairs are 
being taken care of in the CR chamber. Remus is being repaired in one 
as well but his problems could be caused by means other then just 
physical damage. Actally Rodimus Prime is now Hot Rod. The Minions 
succeded in their plans and stripped The Matrix of Leadership from 
Rodimus after he was defeated by Cyclonus in combat. Kup is currently 
watching over Hot Rod and Remus in the base med bay. Relay that to 
Perseus. Also tell him that we have a plan that I need to discuss 
with him.
> 
> ::Kup/Hot Rod::
> 
> Kup had started to nod off when one of the CR chambers chimed. 
It's process was finished. With a hiss the door on the chamber opened 
and Hot Rod stepped out.
> 
> The two old friends come face to face.
> 
> Hot Rod: ..... I... I failed, Kup....
> 
> Kup: No you didn't, Roddy. You fought Cyclonus with everything 
you had. We'll get The Matrix back.
> 
> Hot Rod: How? The Minions ae too strong. I couldn't beat one of 
Unicron's heralds with The Matrix. How am I supposed to do it without 
it?
> 
> Kup: We'll find a way. Elder has a plan. He and Windlord went to 
find Lord Perseus and discuss it. The plan is to....
> 
> Hot Rod: Later, Kup. Where are Nightlight and Elita?
> 
> Kup: Nightlight is showing Hevn around the city. He made a 
comeback while you were fighting Cyclonus. I'm not sure about Elita.
> 
> Hot Rod opens a comm channel to Nightlight.
> 
> Hot Rod: Nightlight, this is Rodi... This is Hot Rod. Do you read 
me?
> 
> He was met with nothing but static.
> 
> Hot Rod: Hmm... I wonder whats up with that.
> 
> He switches the channel to Elita.
> 
> Hot Rod: Elita, this is your dad. Where are you at, honey?
> 
> 
> ---------------------------------

Search.
>
